block.p: BASEBALL American League DETROIT TIGERS--Transferred 1B Tony Clark from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. Claimed P Eric DuBose off waivers from the Cleveland Indians.
BASEBALL American League DETROIT TIGERS--Transferred 1B Tony Clark from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. Claimed P Eric DuBose off waivers from the Cleveland Indians.

Pacific Coast League CALGARY CANNONS--Announced the renewal of their player development contract with the Florida Marlins through the 2002 season. Texas-Louisiana League TLL--Announced the sale of the Amarillo Dillas to a group of investors, headed by Bobby Lee.
BASKETBALL National Basketball Association ORLANDO MAGIC--Signed F Ed O'Bannon.

HOCKEY National Hockey League CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Named Mike Smith general manager. Reassigned G Erasmo Saltarelli, D Marty Wilford, D Steve Poapst, D Jeff Paul, F Geoff Peters, F Valentin Morozov, F Colin Pepperall, F Mike Souza, F Brian McCollough and F Casey Hankinson to Norfolk of the AHL. MINNESOTA WILD--Signed D Nick Schultz. Assigned LW Pascal DuPuis, LW Peter Bartos, D Eric Charron, G Zack Bierk and G David Brumby to Cleveland of the IHL. SAN JOSE SHARKS--Announced the retirement of RW Ron Stern. Signed G Steve Shields to a one-year contract. Assigned D Steve Bancroft, D Dave MacIsaac, G Vesa Toskala, C Andy Lundbohm, RW Jon Cheechoo and LW Jarrett Deuling to Kentucky of the AHL. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Reassigned LW Nils Ekman and C Thomas Ziegler to Detroit of the IHL. Returned RW Nikita Alexeev to Erie of the OHL.

COLLEGE PIONEER FOOTBALL LEAGUE--Announced the addition of Austin Peay, Davidson, Jacksonville and Morehead State, effective for 2001 season. DEPAUL--Suspended sophomore basketball F Jon Oden for two games for violations of team standards. NORTHERN ARIZONA--Announced the suspension of senior WR Francis St. Paul has been extended to six consecutive games. RHODE ISLAND--Named Donna Konuch and Ken Stanley assistant softball coaches. ST. PETER'S, N.J.--Named Mary Wessely associate director of athletics, compliance officer and senior woman administrator. TULANE--Named J.D. Barnett senior associate athletic director for revenue development.
